DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , double-blinded , control clinical effectiveness trial two supplementary food treatment MAM . Specific Aim 1 : Test effectiveness two supplementary food , whey RUSF soy RUSF , treatment MAM 6-59 month old child 12-week home-based supplementary feeding program . Hypothesis : The proportion child recover receive either soy whey RUSF differ three percent .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blinded , control clinical effectiveness trial assess treatment moderate acute malnutrition ( MAM ) one two supplementary food period 12 week . The overall purpose research see child grow gain weight rapidly use one two peanut butter food he/she recovers protein-energy malnutrition . Subjects give soy dairy peanut butter food home . The peanut butter food either small amount soya protein mineral ( iron , zinc ) whey powder mineral add . Subjects enough food feed child 2 week , ask return every 2 week weigh , measure give food . The parent subject ask feed child food his/her weight return consider normal child 's height . Subjects return 3 , 6 12 month check-up . At check-ups , he/she measure examine . The current standard care allow child recover without food supplemental flour thus participation relate research . Participation study expect last 8-12 week therapy follow 12 month completion therapy .
